EmailTemplate.description: Sent to a customer when a case that contains ORC is closed.
EmailTemplate.name: Case - ORC Closed ENG
EmailTemplate.subject: We’ve issued your refund
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for contacting Hudson’s Bay. We’ve issued your refund and it will reflect in your account within 14 days. If you have any questions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to contact us again and refer to case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
CONTACT US NOW
Sincerely, Hudson’s Bay Customer Service
